data.title: Моя Арктика — Туры по Кольскому полуострову
data.meta_description: В туре мы побываем на краю земли, дальше - только Арктика!  Совершим морскую прогулку и поохотимся на китов, запечатлев их на снимках. Побываем на настоящем Кольском Марсе, окунемся в историю на панорамных площадках города - героя Мурманска.
data.meta_site_name: Моя Арктика — Туры по Кольскому полуострову
data.text:
Teriberka – must have in the traveler's piggy bank! Incredible landscapes, famous locations from Zvyagintsev's film "Leviathan" and an ocean of impressions!

8:00 - 8:30 – departure from Murmansk. The road to Teriberka will take about 2.5 hours. On the way, you will listen to a fascinating guide's story about the region, we’ll make stops in the tundra and at the rock garden.

Arrival in Teriberka, inspection of the eternal parking of abandoned fishing ships.

Boat trip and photo hunting for whales, about 2.5-3 hours

Lunch at one of the restaurants in Teriberka.

Walk along the ecological road, visit the dragon eggs beach, the Battery Waterfall with panoramic sea views.

Transfer to old Teriberka, where we will see the skeleton of a whale, the largest swing in the North, walk along the sandy shore.

18:00 - departure to Murmansk

20:30 - 21:00 - Arrival at the hotel

You haven't seen anything like this yet! Fancy rocks, mountains, valleys! Kola has its own Mars, and you will see it!

Tundra de Lovozero is a mountain range in the west of the Kola Peninsula with an area of about a thousand square kilometers! A wild and, at times, harsh place, with a very unusual and beautiful nature will not leave anyone indifferent!

9:00 - departure from Murmansk to the village of Revda! We will spend about 2 hours on the way

Arrival in the village of Revda and ascent to the top of Mount Alluive.It will take about 3 hours to explore picturesque places.

Walk along a gentle slope (1051 meters above sea level), where we will have panoramic views of the tundra, Umbozero and Khibiny

Walk along the mountain plateau to the circus (hollow in the form of an amphitheater)

Snack

Descent down and departure to Murmansk

20:00 – arrival in Murmansk

Murmansk – is a hero city located on rocky hills off the coast of the Kola Bay! We will admire them from the panoramic platforms at the famous monuments! The city is especially beautiful on a polar day!

And we will also visit the bridge of the legendary icebreaker «"Lenin"»For those who wish, we will show you a shop where you can buy fish and seafood!

3.5 hours of guided tours:

Visit to the icebreaker «Lenin».

Moving to the historical center of the city, the place of laying the first stone, the place of Five Corners.

Panoramic platforms of the architectural - memorial complex Saviour - on-waters and Cape Zeleny - monument to Alyosha.

Monument «Waiting Woman».

Monument «to the Chimney».
